about_the_game:
Versus is a free game mode* providing an entirely new way to play Warhammer: Vermintide 2. Engage in thrilling 4v4 battles, alternating between the Five Heroes of Vermintide and the Skaven Ratmen, all set against the backdrop of the rich Warhammer Fantasy Universe.

*Versus is a free update to Vermintide 2 and requires no further download.

Unpredictable and Intense Multiplayer Action:

Two teams of up to four players face off and take turns playing both the Five Heroes and the Pactsworn, offering diverse strategies and unpredictable matches with asymmetrical gameplay features.

Character Variety and Specialization:

As Heroes; choose between the five heroes, each with three career branches to master. As Pactsworn; continuously pick between five different Skavens, each with their own unique abilities. Pick the right Hero for your team and Skaven for the situation!

Familiar Grounds, New Battles:

Rediscover the war-ravaged lands of the Vermintide 2 maps, now reimagined for PVP, letting you experience the familiar lore of the Warhammer Fantasy universe in a brand new, exciting way to play.

New Challenges and Rewards:

Show off your skill with an entirely new progression system containing challenges and rewards designed specifically for Versus.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 @ 2.80 GHz / AMD FX-4350 @ 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
